subject: URGENT: Verify your account
body: We noticed unusual activity. Click the link below to verify your account immediately or it may be locked.

flags.explanation: The sender domain mimics the bank but is different. Always check the exact address.
Urgent tone pressures quick action to bypass caution.
Login link uses HTTP and a non-bank domain. Never enter credentials on unfamiliar sites.
Unexpected compressed attachment could contain malware.

subject: Password reset required by today
body: We updated systems. Please reset your password using the official link below.

flags.explanation: Support domain differs from the official school domain.
Deadline today creates pressure to act without verifying.
Second link points to a look‑alike domain.

subject: Your account will be disabled
body: We detected a violation of our community guidelines. Click the link below to appeal within 24 hours or your account will be permanently disabled.

flags.explanation: The sender domain is not the official Instagram domain.
Threatening permanent disablement pressures you to act quickly.
Appeal link points to a non‑Instagram domain.

subject: Congratulations! You won a free iPhone
body: You have been selected to receive a brand new iPhone. Just pay a small shipping fee to claim your prize.

flags.explanation: Domain mimics Apple but is not official.
Encourages immediate action to claim a prize.
Prize claim link is not on apple.com.
Scam giveaways often include forms or attachments to steal data.

subject: Critical: Virus detected on your computer
body: Your computer is infected. Call our toll‑free number immediately or click the link below to install the security update.

flags.explanation: Scares you with a fake virus alert to push quick action.
Update link points to a suspicious domain.
Fake updates often install malware instead of fixing anything.
